targets.expr:
(
  sum((sum(irate(nstats_responseOverheadHistogram_sum{app=~"$Service"}[2s])) by (app)/ count(nstats_uptime{app=~"$Service"}) by (app)))  / 
  sum((sum(irate(nstats_responseOverheadHistogram_count{app=~"$Service"}[2s])) by (app)/ count(nstats_uptime{app=~"$Service"}) by (app)))
) > 0 

or

((
  sum((sum(irate(nstats_responseOverheadHistogram_sum{app=~"$Service"}[2s])) by (app)/ count(nstats_uptime{app=~"$Service"}) by (app)))  / 
  sum((sum(irate(nstats_responseOverheadHistogram_count{app=~"$Service"}[2s])) by (app)/ count(nstats_uptime{app=~"$Service"}) by (app)))
) > bool 0) < 1
